verses.refrain:
Over yonder, down by the crystal sea,
down by the crystal sea, Over yonder, there's where I long to be,
There's where I long to be, No more sorrow, toil, grief, nor care, In the homeland bright and fair, Over, over there. Over there.
verses.verse: Come let us sing of homeland, Down by the crystal sea; Wonderful land where Jesus Buildeth a mansion for me.
Water of life there floweth, Fruit in abundant store; Citizens of that country Hunger and thirst never more.
Come go with me to homeland, Jesus invites you there; Help spread the invitation, Tell it to men everywhere.
